content.rendered:
Atlantic Airways always lets you travel with one piece checked baggage weighing up to 23kg  plus

 

 

LOW 1 x 23kg bag
ECONOMY 1 x 23kg bag
FLEX 2 x 23kg bags

 

For more details visit : http://www.atlanticairways.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Atlantic Airways Excess Baggage

Atlantic Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage
